content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great place to live. Now, let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in your apartment, and I'm hoping we can reach a fair agreement on the price. Could you please tell me your initial asking price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I'm looking for the best offer. I'm sure you'll understand that I want to get the highest price possible for my property. So, I'm open to any reasonable offer you might have. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm here to negotiate the best deal for both of us. I'm prepared to offer a competitive price for your apartment. Would you be willing to start at €800 per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality of my apartment. It's brand new, in the city center, and close to all amenities. I believe my property is worth more than €800. How about €900?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment does sound very attractive. However, I'm on a budget, and €900 is a bit higher than I can afford. Would you be willing to consider €850 as a compromise? It's a fair price considering the location and amenities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I'm willing to negotiate, but €850 still seems low for an apartment of this quality. It's a prime location, and I've invested a lot in the building. How about we meet in the middle at €875? I think that's a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, €875 is closer to what I'm looking for. It's a reasonable price for an apartment of this size and location. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. Would you be willing to include some basic furniture as part of the package at this price? It would help me to settle in more quickly.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I'm glad we're getting closer to an agreement. However, I'm not interested in including furniture at this time. The apartment is already attractive as an unfurnished space, and I believe the location and condition of the apartment are the main selling points. At €875, the apartment is quite a steal. Do we have a deal at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position on the furniture. The location and condition of the apartment are indeed excellent. At €875, I believe this is a fair price that reflects the quality of your property. I'm ready to sign the lease if you're willing to accept this offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I'm pleased to hear that you're ready to sign the lease. I agree to the price of €875! Let's proceed with the paperwork, and I'll provide you with all the necessary documents to finalize the rental agreement. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
